content:
Lithuania is ready to be part of coalitions that help Ukraine win a large -scale war with the Russian Federation.

About thisstatedLithuanian Foreign Minister Gabrielius Landsbergis on the eve of the meeting of the EU Foreign Affairs Council today, March 18.

"We will discuss everything we cannot do with Ukraine and try to be a little more political and offer some support," he said.

Gabrielus Landsbergis noted that the EU has difficulty in finding an intergovernmental conference that will start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU during Belgium.

"I do not believe that there is an opportunity to negotiate how Europe has to communicate in one voice, but as for my country, we are ready to consider all the options and be part of the coalitions that help Ukraine win this war," said the head of Lithuanian diplomacy.

As reported by ArmyInform, the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of LithuaniaCommentedPutin's Election in Russia stated that it was like a tragic farce.
title: Lithuania will be part of the coalitions that help Ukraine win in this war - the Foreign Minister of the country
description: This was stated by Lithuanian Foreign Minister Gabrielus Landsbergis on the eve of ...
author: Army Inform
